column4: the Art Institute was a destination for several field trips in elementary and middle school.  The last time I visited I was with a friend in her first year of college
column5: and she needed to hurriedly study the Chinese art.  It involved dashing from one plaque to another for her to complete a homework assignment.  This is not the way I'd recommend seeing the Art Institute.  The museum is huge
column6: and if you want to see everything
column7: you will need at least two hours.  However
column8: if you want to narrow down exactly what you want to see
column9: you can get through here within 1 to 1 1/2 hours.
